title: Riot not going to acknowledge Dekars boosting stream?
body:
The title says Boosting silver - gold subs.... And hes literally picking from his subs and inviting them..?

Riot allows boosting?

replies.body:
Of they allow boosting, they even encourage it. Welcome to dynamic Q.

If they wouldn't encourage it they could just separate solo MMR from group MMR.
It's not boosting, its Dynamic Queue Kappa
It's not boosting because he's just dynamic queing with other people :)

He dynamic boosts its technically boosting but technically legal under riots rules because well dynamic que. He only does this because there is no point to play in high elo with dynamic que and how easy it is too "boost" people

you can do the same thing with smurfs and as he is doing with duo q. boosting is when you play on someones account and you play it until its in a higher elo...so this is not boosting. 

however, since subs pay him to do this its a bit unethical if you look at it like that.

I mean I dont see a problem with it or care since it doesnt really effect anything but the main problem that does effect me is dynamic que being as bad as it is. He is just boosting 4 people at a time instead of just a buddy or something via duo.
Is he carrying any single person a whole division? A tier? several tiers?
no blue anymore is there something up with the arbiter things?
The title is only on the PB&M and Misc. boards.
Geez, the amount of times I see this get asked. You must face palm so hard.
i kind of want to check this stream out. are you spelling it properly?
just search it its the top one on twitch first vid is boosting
i searched for both dekars and for "Boosting silver - gold subs". got nothing.
dekars173 is all the info i needed.
of course they do as long as its not tyler1
